DOC.brief_title: Uterine Fibroid Embolization ( UFE ) Symptomatic Fibroids : Comparison Gel-Bead Commonly Used Embolic Agents .
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , prospective study conduct one site United Kingdom . Up 30 subject enrol treat Gel-Bead . Prospectively . Enrolled Gel-Bead subject follow 1-month 3-months post-procedure . Data subject treat Gel-Bead compare data previously unpublished , widely present , 100-patient cohort study University Hospital Southampton . This study evaluate 20 subject five different treatment group treatment symptomatic uterine fibroid . The five treatment group include gelatin foam slurry , Embospheres , polyvinyl alcohol ( PVA ) , Bead Block Embozenes .
